p: Translated amino acid sequences of 50 ZIKV polyproteins ( Table S1) were aligned using ClustalW [ 28]. Trees were constructed by neighbor joining of pairwise amino acid distances with the program MEGA7 (according to the distance scale provided) [ 29]. Bootstrap resampling was used to determine robustness of branches; values of â‰¥50% (from 1000 replicates) were used.
